Hi, I’m Asel Turatbek Kyzy
Turning innovative ideas into clean, scalable,
and user-focused web & mobile solutions.
about.title: DISCOVER WHO I AM
about.profile: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about turning real-world ideas into impactful applications. I’ve worked on various web and mobile projects, some of them funded by TÜBİTAK, handling both frontend and backend tasks. I'm always eager to learn and grow in collaborative environments.
about.degree: B.Sc. in Computer Technology and Information Systems
about.exp1:
Azerion (Oct 2024 – Present)
Internship – Worked on humoq.com (Next.js + Go), voidu.com admin flow, and thegurume.com AI features using Nest.js and MongoDB.
about.exp2:
Freelance (Oct 2024 – Dec 2024)
Led the development of a real-time social app (React Native + Node.js + Firebase).

projects.title: Highlighting projects that shaped my journey as a developer and problem-solver.

project1.title: MasAI – AI-Powered Storytelling App
project1.subtitle: Fullstack Developer | TÜBİTAK 2209-A | 2025
project1.description: Developed a mobile app that generates personalized children's stories using AI.

project2.title: EcoOil – Waste Oil Recycling App
project2.subtitle: Frontend Developer | TÜBİTAK 2209-A | 2023–2024
project2.description: Mobile app for scheduling and tracking waste oil pickups with map-based density insights.

project3.title: Beauty Center Management System
project3.subtitle: Fullstack Developer | In Development | 2025–Present
project3.description: Web app for beauty centers to manage appointments and inventory. Includes responsive dashboard and RESTful APIs.

project4.title: Real-Time Messaging App
project4.subtitle: Fullstack Developer | 2023
project4.description: University project: Real-time messaging with chat rooms, user auth, and live syncing using Firebase.
